title: Change Password
recognizeError: We do not recognize this password. Try again or reset your password.
noMatch: Passwords do not match. Please try again.
passwordValidError: Passwords must be at least four characters.
passwordMaxLengthMessage: Passwords must contain no more than 32 characters. Current count: ${ passwordLength }
passwordMinLengthMessage: Passwords must be at least 7 characters
passwordRegexMessage: Passwords must contain 1 uppercase letter and 1 number
